name: Night Shift at Chummys
description:
Getting called into work on your day off sucks. Especially when there's a serial killer on the loose. Can you put the pieces together and finish the night shift?
Discover what's lurks below the Chummys Sandwiches, as you piece together the truth behind the sandwich meat.


This is my first game!  I'm excited to bring you "Night Shift at Chummys" 

I am working on other projects and really excited to show them off when their finished!  Want a look behind the curtain? Visit Sokkastudios!
